DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate long-term safety Ba253BINEB . Secondarily long-term efficacy Ba253BINEB also investigate .
DOC.brief_title: A Long-term Study Ba253BINEB Patients With Bronchial Asthma
DOC.criteria: The patient bronchial asthma satisfy follow criterion 1 . Patients age > = 20 year old 2 . Patients mild moderate severity 3 . Patients must able understand patient information form 1 . Patients take long acting corticosteroid ( i.m . ) within 1 month screen test 2 . Patients use corticosteroid medication ( p.o./ i.h . ) dose excess equivalent 10 mg/day prednisolone 3 . Patients glaucoma 4 . Patients prostatic hypertrophy 5 . Patients hypersensitivity anticholinergic drug 6 . Patients begin treatment hyposensitization immunoregulator therapy within 3 month screen test 7 . Patients complicate chronic bronchitis , emphysema bronchiectasis , make assessment drug efficacy bronchial asthma difficult 8 . Patients serious hepatic disease , kidney disease heart disorder judge investigator inappropriate subject study 9 . Women pregnant may become pregnant , nursing woman 10 . Patients judge investigator inappropriate subject study
